dcterms:creator: T. M. Sutter
I. Daunhawer
J. E. Vogt
dcterms:description: The PolyMNIST dataset consists of sets of ten MNIST digits where each set includes five images with the same digit label but different backgrounds and different styles of handwriting. Each background is referred to as a 'modality' to capture source-specific information.
dcterms:title: PolyMNIST

dcterms:creator: J. Yang
R. Shi
D. Wei
Z. Liu
L. Zhao
B. Ke
H. Pfister
B. Ni
dcterms:description: MedMNIST v2 is a large-scale MNIST-like dataset collection of standardized biomedical images, including datasets of 2D and 3D data. The Organ{A,C,S}MNIST subset is based on CT images from axial, coronal, and sagittal views for organ classification.
dcterms:title: MedMNIST

dcterms:description: The ImageCLEFmedical dataset is derived from biomedical articles within the PMC OpenAccess subset, containing figures sourced from open access biomedical journal articles, along with radiology images extracted from original medical cases. It includes tasks for concept detection and prediction.
dcterms:title: ImageCLEFmedical
